11.3. [Pseudo-Bede] In S. Joannis evangelium expositio.
Exposition | Gospel of John
Manuscripts:
1. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Reg. lat. 307. saec. ix2/4; Lyon.
First part of this commentary appears to have been borrowed from Alcuin's commentary on John, see Giuseppe Cremascoli, "I commenti al Vangelo di Giovanni in età carolingia," in Lingua e Stile del Vangelo di Giovanni. Genova: D.AR.FI.CL.ET, 1991, p. 137-154, esp. 141-142.
See also Michael M. Girman, “The Oldest Epitome of Augustine’s Tractatus in euangelium Ioannis and Commentairies on the Gospel of John in the Early Middle Ages,” Revue des Études Augustiniennes 43 (1997), p. 77-81.
